mapper.delete: delete from t_commodity where uid=#{uid} and version=#{version}
mapper.select: select * from t_commodity A inner join (select `uid`, max(`version`) as `version` from t_commodity where `uid`=#{uid}) B on A.`version`=B.`version` and A.`uid`=B.`uid`
select * from t_commodity where uid=#{uid} and version=#{version}
select * from t_commodity A inner join (select `uid`, max(`version`) as `version` from t_commodity group by uid) B on A.`uid`=B.`uid` and A.`version`=B.`version`
